column1: '''Tuckborough''' was an old and important settlement in the [[Westfarthing]] of [[the Shire]]
column2: nestled in the [[Green Hill Country]]. A road connected Tuckborough with [[the Yale]] and [[Stock]] (with the [[Causeway]]) to the east.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> It was the location of [[Great Smials]]
column3: the ancestral seat of the [[Took Family|Took clan]]

column2: towns and villages of the Shire]]
